column1: Attendances by time of day distribution

The table below shows a count of unplanned A&E attendances by day of the week, across a 24 hour period with those arriving by ambulance being shown separately. The data shown cover the 204-25 financial year.
Activity in English NHS Hospitals and English NHS commissioned activity in the independent sector.
For more information on data quality please see the data quality note accompanying this publication.
